entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Invalid cached console cursor position on Unix #77995
  • RegexCharClass.CanMerge inhibits optimization based on previous optimization #77994
    Future
  • Enhance the retry after of System.Threading.RateLimiting #77991
  • TLS Handshake error: `Win32Exception: The message received was unexpected or badly formatted` #77989
  • Could not load file or assembly System.Text.Json Version=7.0.0.0,or one of its dependencies. The located assembly's manifest definition does not match the assembly reference. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80131040) #77988
  • Expose data protection keychains through X509Store #77986
  • Handle returned GetMainProgramHandle() not sufficient for resolving statically linked native symbols on iOS #77985
  • [gcstress0x3-gcsttress0xc] Interop/COM/ComWrappers/WeakReference/WeakReferenceTest/WeakReferenceTest fails #77976
  • [jitstress-random] Assertion failed '((lclNode->gtFlags & GTF_VAR_DEF) != 0) && (((lclNode->gtFlags & GTF_VAR_USEASG) != 0) == !isFullDef)' #77975
  • Simplify Microsoft.Win32.Registry sources split #77974
    Future
  • AccessViolation when calling rejitted method #77973
  • Recursive assembly spec parsing with textual PGO #77971
  • [API Proposal]: Add Length and IsEmpty properties to System.BinaryData #77970
  • Perf-trap with `IBinaryInteger<T>.WriteLittleEndian` #77969
  • [libraries-pgo] Assert failure: Reached the "unreachable" in getArrayOrStringLength #77968
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerRootHidden` elements cannot have identical names #77965
  • UDP socket cannot be disconnected with Connect(IPAddress.Any, 0) #77962
  • OutOfMemoryException in container that didn't have enough memory to allocate an LOH segment #77961
  • Test failure baseservices/threading/regressions/beta2/437017/437017.sh #77960
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.IndexOfAny{Except}WhiteSpace #77959
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Reflection Invoke crashing on methods with ref void* arguments #73100
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'unused->OperIs(GT_CNS_INT)' #77152
    8.0.0
  • [Question] [Android] Crash due to crypto asserts #77258
  • add support for abstract namespaces in Unix domain sockets #77931
  • [Possible bug]: Custom setter being up to 40 times slower than directly setting a field's value #77964
  • Consolidate IndexOf variations into helper in regex source generator and compiler #77905
    8.0.0
  • Implementations of Double.ExpM1, Double.LogP1 & co are not correct for arguments close to 0 #77979
  • Test failure GC/LargeMemory/Regressions/largearraytest/largearraytest.sh #77477
  • [.NET 8] Mono workload doesn't import Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoAOTCompiler.Task #77385
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Should not see phi nodes after rationalize"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #77886
    8.0.0
  • ILCompiler failed to ASP.NET WebApplication for ARM64 AOT, with 'System.Net.Quic' #77966
  • [NativeAOT] Document steps for consuming static libraries #77951

PullRequests

Created

  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Enhance the retry after of System.Threading.RateLimiting #77992
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add a VN-based dead store removal phase #77990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop keeping resolved deps around for app lifetime #77987
    area-Host, 8.0.0
  • Add linker to area owners #77983
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Fix GenTreeCall::Equals for virtual vs static calls #77981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Be more precise about choosing what to DNER in block morphing #77980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove .NET 6 Console Key Parser #77977
    area-System.Console, 8.0.0
  • Pass NodeFactory to ObjectData's Section #77967
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Merged

  • Add readmes for configuration packages, part 2 #77982
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Allow deleting any kind of nodes after address mode formation #77872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts (backport of #74504) #77508
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Define __cpuid{ex} only when there's no builtin one (backport of #73065) #77507
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix process aborts when using cryptographic primitives with empty input for Android #77283
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 6.0.12
  • Fix StreamReader EOF handling and improve perf #69888
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Managed EventSources do not show up by default in EventPipe sessions (#75248) #77811
    Servicing-approved, EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.1
  • Refactor ProcessStartInfoTests to use WindowsTestAccount #77804
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Update assembly version from hardcoded to MajorVersion" #77899
  • check the right return value for mmap #77952
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix typo in docs of AdvSimd.Arm64.TransposeOdd #76971
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Improve IndexOf handling in regex source generator / compiler #77925
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Add and use a MakeSrcRegOptional that validates IsSafeToContainMem was called #77895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary encoding allocations in System.Private.DataContractSerialization #76366
    area-Serialization

Updated

  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes, do_jit_call, and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Clean-up `Microsoft.Win32.Registry` and remove the non-Windows code. #77996
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add AVX-512 testing pipeline #77930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement AES-GCM with CryptoKit on macOS #76490
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix the build with BACKGROUND_GC turned off #77328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add Readme.md for Resources, Threading.Tasks, Threading.Channels, ComilerServices, Configuration and CodeDom assemblies #77932
    area-Meta
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating CreateScalar to be intrinsic for Vector64/128/256 #77798
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Sync linker to NativeAOT #77894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix Configuration with IList and ICollection #77857
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Add ability for crossgen2 to synthesize PGO histograms #77683
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Vectorize String.Equals for OrdinalIgnoreCase #77947
    area-System.Globalization
  • Move the `[With|Get]Element(SIMD)` folding to local morph #76491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • DNER multi-reg locals early if they cannot be enregistered #77943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages (backport of #75597) #77509
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well (backport of #66594) #77506
    Servicing-approved, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.12
  • [release/6.0] Fix gcc warnings during mono linux-x64 build (backport of #60675) #77505
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • Improve coreclr test infra #77929
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix thread-safety issues with enumerating ResourceManager. #75054
    area-System.Resources, community-contribution
  • MemoryExtensions.Replace(Span<T>, T, T) implemented #76337
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix sprintf deprecation error with Xcode 14.1 #77950
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, test-enhancement
  • avoid alpn allocation on windows #74619
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • [mono] MiniJIT OP_XEQUAL for floats #77770
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [JIT] X64 - Minor optimizations for arithmetic and `not` / `neg` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change regMask_enum and regMaskTP to unsigned __int64_t on AMD64. #77571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Optimize (WasmRoot|WasmExternalRoot).clear #77521
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Linker into runtime diff #77569
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-linker
  • [corlib] Move System.Reflection.Emit.SignatureHelper to the shared partition #77939
    area-System.Reflection
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Use Environment.IsPrivilegedProcess #77847
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add intrinsics for clz and ctz instructions #77777
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Adding new ReadyToRun helper for static cctor #76898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Update repository URL in package.json #77937
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix CngKey.KeySize for keys in the Platform Crypto Provider #77809
    area-System.Security
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • [release/7.0] [ppc64le] Implementation of mono_arch_get_delegate_virtual_invoke_impl method for ppc64le architecture #77788
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Correct minimum memory size value from 200MB to 20MB #77787
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • WIP: Clean near unmaintainable parallel logic 53593 #76949
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • [mono] Added null-checks for LDFLDA on pointers. #77827
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • unify error handling for FileStream and Pipe Streams #77543
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Fix relative symlink support in TarFile #77338
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Implement Console.SetWindowSize() for linux #75824
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77926
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Suppress warnings for deprecated keychain APIs #77924
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, 7.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix DebuggerTypeProxy for structs and for classes with multiple constructors #77039
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C: SetMessageSendPendingException and SetMessageSendCallback #77956
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Small cleanups #77954
    area-Build-mono
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Add support for dehydrated runtime data structures #77884
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allocate boxed static structs on Frozen Object Heap #77737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Slightly relax "const vector propagation" heuristics #76788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
